venue.name: Roots and Wings Yoga and Healing ArtsCenter

item.description:
How much time do you spend thinking about this and that, planning or worrying about the future, or just "in your head" instead of in your experience?

When you do this, what are you missing? What opportunities are lost? What are you creating and not creating?

In this month's meetup, we’ll be discussing the topic of “This delicious moment: the power of being present and in the now”. We’ll be addressing questions like:

  • What does it mean to be present and how do you do it?
  • What are the benefits of being mindful and present in the now?
  • How does it relate to law of attraction? Will it make manifesting what I want easier?
  • And any other questions you might have.

I’ll also be guiding you through two powerful guided meditations to get you deeply present. One of them is called “This delicious moment” and it involves real food! The other is a hand meditation.

If you want to join us in this experiential and masterminding event:

1. RSVP YES on our meetup site
2. Bring a food for yourself that you really enjoy and can use for the guided meditation. (Ideas: chocolate, fruit, a piece of pastry – something you can really get your senses into.)

When you RSVP yes, we plan on you being there!  Please let us know if your plans change, so we won’t be waiting for you unnecessarily or wasting handouts and snacks,

There's nothing better than feeling good and having fun. Please join us and stay "connected" by using our community's message board and receiving our e-mails (which will include our "Good Vibrations" tips and news). To be able to do so, go to your account, and under "Your Groups", each one has an "Edit email settings". Set your preferences there. Hope to hear from you!

Eagerly looking forward to co-creating with you!

Ann and Mark
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the Wings studio on the first floor

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: This Delicious Moment: The Power of Being Present in your NOW
